segments.text: What a nice dress , Jean.You look marvelous !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You , too . Where did you get your new hat ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: From the Crown's . Oh , what lovely earrings you have ! Are they diamond ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . It's a birthday present from my husband !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you are lucky to have such a considerate husband . Mine hasn't brought me a single rose since we married .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He'll come out with surprises . Just wait and see . Look at that woman , with the white chiffon !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I like the dress . It must be the latest fashion . Look , the hem has lowered , and the waist narrowed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It makes me feel rather shabby . That woman has a good taste in dressing , I would say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . She dressed with an individual flair . I rather envy her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Most women follow fashion like sheep.They don't know any better than imitate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I quite agree with you.See the woman there ? I dare say she hasn't got any eyes . How could she match the mauve gown with the green handbag ? And all that jewelry !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The gown is quite expensive , believe me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So what ? It only makes her look cheap and vulgar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know those upstarts . They're all show-offs ! I think I'd better have a diet ; otherwise I'd look like a ballon soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're quite slim . In fact , if you were one of those starlets , the movie company would say you have a fabulous figure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my shoes pinch me . Let's find a seat and sit a while .
segments.speaker: S2
